original_title: Hillary's America: The Secret History of the Democratic Party
overview: In Hillary's America, bestselling author and influential filmmaker Dinesh Dâ€™Souza reveals the sordid truth about Hillary Clinton and the secret history of the Democratic Party. This important and controversial film releases at a critical time leading up to the 2016 Presidential campaign and challenges the state of American politics.
tagline: See the movie that changed the election.
title: Hillary's America: The Secret History of the Democratic Party
